item.title: What if we’re living in a computer simulation? | Technology | The Guardian
item.description: <img src="https://i.guim.co.uk/img/media/6a7e7c19ac79a3b9be199f8c5798a813107a5b90/0_0_1930_1158/master/1930.jpg?w=300&amp;q=55&amp;auto=format&amp;usm=12&amp;fit=max&amp;s=85e6a8e12d37b3885dff8a5fd5ca19d2" alt=""> Virtual reality technology is making great advances, but it has also helped popularise a theory long debated by philosophers and now gaining supporters in Silicon Valley – that the outside world is itself a simulation Source: What if we’re living in a computer simulation? | Technology | The Guardian
